snippet: New actions by the United States Treasury and State departments came on the third day of a ground offensive that could signal a turn in the battle for Aleppo, Syria’s largest city.

byline.original: By RICK GLADSTONE and ANNE BARNARD
byline.contributor: Damien Cave reported from Beirut, and Alan Cowell from Paris. An employee of The New York Times contributed reporting from Aleppo, Syria; Hala Droubi from Dubai, United Arab Emirates; Dalal Mawad and Hwaida Saad from Beirut; Thomas Erdbrink from Tehran; and Rick Gladstone from New York.

lead_paragraph: New actions by the United States Treasury and State departments came on the third day of a ground offensive that could signal a turn in the battle for Aleppo, Syria’s largest city.

headline.seo: U.S. Moves to Add Pressure on Syria
headline.main: U.S. Moves to Add Pressure on Syria, as Battles Grind On
headline.print_headline: War of Words and Arms Amid Assault in Syrian City

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
